Participants should be', 'questioned carefully for new dry unproductive cough or new respiratory limitation of', 'exercise tolerance at each visit. A normal chest x-ray is unreliable to exclude BIP. Evaluate for infectious causes per', 'institutional standard and consider antibiotic use if appropriate.
